lst.str: S. sugar program offers a loan rate of 18 cents per pound and because payments to farmers from beet processors are spread evenly over the growing season, said Luther Markwart, executive vice president of the American sugarbeet growers association.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Horis Godfrey, a consultant representing Florida and Texas cane growers, said Florida cane is off to a good start because for the first time in several years there was no winter freeze.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The acreage planted to sugarbeets will receive more than the usual amount of attention this year because of mounting concern that continued increases in domestic sugar production threaten the U.
